realm.name: Ashenfell
realm.description: The primary setting of the story, a fantasy realm under threat from the Shadowblight corruption spreading from the north

locations.name: Obsidian Caverns
locations.description: Deep caverns beneath Mount Cinderpeak where Zarathax slumbered for a thousand years

environment.atmosphere: sulfurous smoke billows from caves during awakening

locations.name: Mount Cinderpeak
locations.description: Volcanic mountain home to the Obsidian Caverns, site of Zarathax's lair

locations.name: Temple of Eternal Flame
locations.description: Sacred temple of the Keepers of the Ancient Pact order, maintains covenant between dragonkind and humanity

locations.name: Moonwell Spring
locations.description: Magical spring source of water used in rituals

locations.name: Valorheim
locations.description: Capital city of the realm, seat of King Aldric III
locations.corruption_level: half of noble houses controlled by shadow corruption

locations.name: Northern Border Villages
locations.description: Villages on the northern border that are disappearing, replaced by zones of absolute darkness

environment.threat: zones of absolute darkness consuming all who entered

locations.name: Ancient Ruins of the First Kingdom
locations.description: Structures predating human civilization revealed when Zarathax emerged, covered in glowing runes from the Time Before
locations.significance: Meeting place for the Alliance of Light

locations.name: Ironpeak Mountains
locations.description: Mountain range containing dwarven holds, refused to join the Alliance
locations.historical_grudge: bitter about Dragon Wars that destroyed ancestral city of Karak-Thun

cross_ref.name: dwarven holds
cross_ref.note: Refused to join Alliance due to ancient grudge

locations.name: Karak-Thun
locations.description: Ancestral dwarven city destroyed during the Dragon Wars
locations.historical_significance: Source of dwarven bitterness toward dragons

locations.name: Silverwood
locations.description: Elven kingdom that sealed its borders, trusting in its own magical defenses

locations.name: Scorching Wastes
locations.description: Desert wasteland region home to nomadic tribes

cross_ref.name: nomadic tribes
cross_ref.note: Reject northern powers, follow their own gods

locations.name: Whispering Marshes
locations.description: Swamp region filled with illusion magic that shows worst fears

locations.name: Last Temple
locations.description: Ruined temple where Dawn Blade was kept before being stolen

locations.name: Last Temple
locations.description: Temple in the marshes that once held the Dawn Blade, now ruined
locations.historical_significance: Original location of Dawn Blade before theft

locations.name: Dragon's Graveyard
locations.description: Sacred site where ancient dragons go to die, contains remains of ancient dragons
locations.threat: Shadow Lord sent servants to defile the site

locations.name: Necropolis of Fallen Kings
locations.description: Necropolis containing a lich-lord who guards the Fragment of Courage

locations.name: Saltmere
locations.description: Port city home to the Thieves Guild led by Vex Shadowmere

cross_ref.name: Vex Shadowmere
cross_ref.note: Leader of Thieves Guild in Saltmere

locations.name: Void Between Worlds
locations.description: Interdimensional space where Shadow Lord Nex'thara was sealed

environmental_effects.name: Shadowblight
environmental_effects.description: Corruption spreading across Ashenfell from the north, draining magic and consuming all it touches

environmental_effects.name: Eternal Flame
environmental_effects.description: Ancient fire magic burning in Zarathax's chest, one of three anchors sealing the Shadow Lord
environmental_effects.significance: One of three seals preventing Nex'thara's return

environmental_effects.name: Sunfire
environmental_effects.description: New form of magic combining fire magic with holy light, effective against shadow creatures

environmental_effects.name: Compulsion Magic
environmental_effects.description: Dragon's voice carries magical weight that can freeze mortals in place
environmental_effects.effect: Freezes all who hear in place

spatial_relationships.description: Capital city lies to the south of the mountain
Corrupted villages lie to the north of the capital

spatial_relationships.note: Dwarven holds in separate mountains refused Alliance

spatial_relationships.description: Zarathax barely returned from the graveyard to his mountain lair after exhausting his power
